# GitHub Labels Reference

Standard labels for Lancelot issue tracking.

## Issue Type

| Label | Use For |
|-------|---------|
| `bug` | Something isn't working |
| `enhancement` | New feature or improvement |
| `documentation` | Documentation updates |
| `refactor` | Code refactoring or cleanup |
| `chore` | Maintenance or non-feature work |

## Priority & Severity

| Label | Use For |
|-------|---------|
| `critical` | System down, data loss risk |
| `high-priority` | Urgent, blocking work |
| `priority/medium` | Standard priority |
| `priority/low` | Nice-to-have, can wait |
| `severity/blocker` | Blocks other work |

## Lancelot-Specific

| Label | Use For |
|-------|---------|
| `ibmi` | IBM i integration issues |
| `gitlab-integration` | GitLab API or workflow issues |
| `jira-integration` | Jira integration issues |
| `architecture` | Architectural decisions or design |
| `devsecops` | Security, compliance, or DevOps |
| `performance` | Performance optimization or profiling |

## Workflow

| Label | Use For |
|-------|---------|
| `needs-triage` | Requires review and classification |
| `good first issue` | Good for newcomers |
| `help wanted` | Extra attention needed |
| `blocked` | Blocked by another issue |
| `question` | Further information requested |

## Resolution

| Label | Use For |
|-------|---------|
| `wontfix` | Will not be addressed |
| `duplicate` | Already exists (reference original issue) |
| `tech-debt` | Improving code quality or reducing debt |
